articles.title: Fireball seen in NJ and Mid-Atlantic sky: Details on meteor - NorthJersey.com
articles.description: A blazing fireball flew across the Mid-Atlantic region of the U.S., dazzling eyewitnesses who reported the sighting to the American Meteor Society.
articles.content:
A blazing fireball flew Sunday night across the Mid-Atlantic region of the United States, dazzling hundreds of eyewitnesses who reported the sighting to the American Meteor Society.
